channel.title: Projects on ByteCase
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on ByteCase

item.title: Visual Based Game Cheats
item.description: Game cheat completely based on the monitor output, can not be caught by kernal level anitcheat.

item.title: Evolution-Sim
item.description: A simulated world where Prey and Predator interact and learn to survive base on RL using NEAT algorithm

item.title: Snake Playing Algorithm
item.description: A very simple rule based snake playing algorithm to complete the game in as few moves as possible
